com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui.dialogs.messagebox

Interface MessageBoxPresenter.MessageBoxView

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CancableView, DefaultButtonView, DefaultView, HasDialogCloseButton
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MessageBoxDialog, MessageBoxDialog
    Enclosing class:
    MessageBoxPresenter

    public static interface MessageBoxPresenter.MessageBoxView
extends DefaultButtonView
    The interface MessageBoxView is used by MessageBoxPresenter to present a MessageBoxPresenter.MessageBoxModel.
